TITLE: How to Get Things Done When You Don’t Want to Do Anything
SUMMARY: The drive to be your best can be hard to muster right about now. Here are some ways to get your mojo back.

TITLE: 11 Exercises For Better Sleep
SUMMARY: Stretching and meditative movement like yoga before bed can improve the quality of your sleep and the amount you sleep. Here is a short and calming routine of 11 stretches and exercises.

TITLE: Do We Really Need to Take 10,000 Steps a Day for Our Health?
SUMMARY: The advice that we take 10,000 steps a day is more a marketing accident than based on science. Taking far fewer may have notable benefits.

TITLE: How Much Water Should I Drink?
SUMMARY: Here’s how to know when you truly need to hydrate.

TITLE: Can a Good-Enough Marriage Make for a Great Divorce?
SUMMARY: In continuing to share a home, along with our teenage kids, my ex and I have found true partnership.

TITLE: Ice for Sore Muscles? Think Again.
SUMMARY: Icing muscles after strenuous exercise is not just ineffective, it could be counterproductive, a new study in mice suggests.

TITLE: Are Natural Deodorants Better for You?
SUMMARY: Much of the marketing suggests that they’re safer than more traditional underarm products, but that hype is not based on science.

TITLE: Why Does the U.S. Have So Many Mass Shootings? Research Is Clear: Guns.
SUMMARY: Americans advance a lot of theories for why they have so many more gun deaths than other countries do. The answer is lying in plain sight.

TITLE: USMNT's Tyler Adams Doesn't Need an Armband to Be a Captain
SUMMARY: The RB Leipzig star is too young to be stained by the U.S.’s failure to qualify for the last World Cup. But he is old enough to know it is his job to make it right.
